Detailed Description

OpenIPMP DRM manager used in decoding process.

Creates openIPMP DRM decryptors.

)  [pure virtual]
 

Create openIPMP DRM decryptor.

Use information contained in openIPMP DRM information.

Parameters:
info input, openIPMP DRM information.
xml input, XML document.
Returns:
If succeeds, openIPMP DRM decryptor pointer. If fails, zero pointer.
